item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Spider Man: Across The Spider Verse [2160p | Dolby Vision/HDR10 | E-AC3-JOC 5.1 English + Subs]
item.description:
​
NOTE : The movie is ripped from the Dolby Vision, but the file works on HDR10 devices too.

​
Release Date: 31/05/2023
Synopsis:
After finding Gwen Stacy, Spider-Man, the friendly full-time neighborhood of Brooklyn, is catapulted through the multiverse, where he meets a team of Spider-People charged with protecting his very existence.
